attributes.action: Stop halal meat in State Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A school in  Hamstead has decided that because 3/4   of pupils are of muslim faith, they will provide only halal meat for schools meals. Despite the cruelty that animals suffer by having their throats cut without stunning first. This country has a law  to stop this barbaric practice, now, it seems that is to be thrown out  to appease members of one particular religion.It must stop.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop halal meat in State Schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14794.asp

Prime Minister's Office
